channel.title: [474]innovation client help- how to fix the download cache problem?
channel.description: i got an unleeched innovation source, but the client i'm having troubles fixing, everytime i run the client which the ip i changed to 127.0.0.1, i get a black screen with righting on it and its having problems downloading the cache to my c: drive, any idea how to remove the automatic download cache and put my own cache in it?
